jobDescription:
Our Healthcare client is looking to bring aboard a mid to senior level Software Engineers with strong Java development background working in a Linux/UNIX environment, coupled with knowledge of Microservices/API frameworks.  This would be to join their team on a 12+ month consulting basis with a strong potential for extension. 

Responsibilities would include:

Develop microservices using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, or other programming languages, adhering to industry best practices and coding standards.
Develop and execute unit, component and integration tests, using Cypress and/or Cucumber, to verify the engineering work meets requirements
Document design decisions, design patterns, and implementation details related to the engineering work
Software development adhering to SDLC including requirements discovery, design, verification, product delivery and maintenance
Execution of manual test procedures
Troubleshooting of failed tests or other software bugs
Participates in Agile ceremonies as a member of a scrum team
The ideal candidate will have multiple years of experience with the following:

 

Strong professional experience using object-oriented design, data modeling, and analysis methodologies
Extensive background working with Enterprise Java technologies and using application servers including Spring, Spring Boot and/or other micro-services/API frameworks.
Experience with Angular
Unit testing background utilizing Cypress or Cucumber
Experience working with Global teams and cross functional teams
Unix/Linux skills, including finding and fixing abnormal processes, using shell scripting
TDD and/or BDD practices.
